alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 8:08PM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Cross Bayou At Cross Lake affecting Caddo Parish. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Cross Bayou At Cross Lake. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 172.1 feet. - Forecast...The lake is forecast to rise above flood stage by tomorrow. The lake will rise to 173.5 feet by Saturday. The lake will slowly fall next week. - Flood stage is 173.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 815 PM CDT.
